committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations under the Vocational Educational Act of 1963.

summary.text: Amends the Vocational Education Act of 1963 to extend the authorization of appropriations for: (1) basic grants; (2) program improvement and supportive services; (3) special programs for the disadvantaged; (4) consumer and homemaking education; (5) State plans, reports, and evaluations; (6) grants to State advisory councils; (7) the National Advisory Council on Vocational Education; (8) bilingual vocational education programs; (9) instructor training programs; (10) development of instructional materials, methods, and techniques; and (11) emergency assistance for remodeling and renovation of vocational education facilities.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations under the Vocational Educational Act of 1963.
